resources.string: Sorry i did not get it, can you repeat it master

Hello I am Nala and I am here to help you use your smart phone.. Whenever you need me please tap the screen and tell me slow and clear what you want.. To ask for the menu of choices please say "MENU"!
Ok! Please tell me the contact name.
Thats fine! Now tell me the contact number.
Who would you want me to call?
I am so sorry I cannot find a contact with this name! Please try again
